body:
Actually, you are right. There isn’t any difference in the link. 

But, the URL is so long that it spanned across multiple lines and doesn’t display it correctly.  

 

Thank you & Regards, 

Zalak Shah 

Systems Analyst 

CACR | Indiana University 

2719 E. 10th Street, Suite 231 | Bloomington, IN 47408

 

From: Brian Bockelman [mailto:notifications@github.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2017 2:45 PM
To: opensciencegrid/security <security@noreply.github.com>
Cc: Shah, Zalak Sunilkumar <zsshah@iu.edu>; Author <author@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [opensciencegrid/security] Corrected a link (#13)

 

I can't tell from the online diff viewer - what's the difference between the two links?

—
